translation.home.hero.title: Digital Gap Assessment Tool
translation.home.hero.subtitle: Empowering Cooperatives Through Digital Transformation
translation.home.hero.description: A comprehensive tool by DGRV and BMZ to help cooperatives measure, analyze, and close digitalization gaps with strategic assessments and actionable recommendations.
translation.home.features.title: Key Features
translation.home.features.description: Everything you need to drive your cooperative's digital journey.
translation.home.features.assessmentDescription: Comprehensive evaluation across 8 key perspectives to measure your current digital maturity level.
translation.home.features.planningDescription: Define your target digital state and create actionable plans to bridge the gaps.
translation.home.features.trackingDescription: Monitor your digital transformation journey with annual comparisons and performance metrics.
translation.home.benefits.title: Why Choose Our Tool?
translation.home.benefits.description: Built with the unique needs of cooperatives in mind.
translation.home.benefits.empowermentDescription: Designed specifically for cooperatives in Southern Africa and beyond.
translation.home.benefits.securityDescription: Enterprise-grade security with encrypted data storage and regular backups.
translation.home.benefits.accessibilityDescription: Works online and offline, optimized for low-bandwidth environments.
translation.home.partners.title: Developed with Support From
translation.home.partners.description: A collaborative effort to foster digital inclusion.
translation.home.partners.bmzDescription: Federal Ministry for Economic Cooperation and Development
translation.home.cta.title: Ready to Transform Your Cooperative?
translation.home.cta.description: Start your digital transformation journey today and unlock new opportunities for growth and efficiency.
